channel.title: Portfolios on Underflow
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Underflow

item.title: Paper of CNVs Detection
item.description: Introduced two popular genome amplification methods, compared their capabilities and evaluated a few popular models for calling single-nucleotide polymorphisms and copy-number variations.

item.title: Remote Control for deployment
item.description: A remote SSH CLI session tool for deployment and maintenance based on python.

item.title: Songle
item.description: A location-based mobile phone puzzle game which allows users to follow a map and collect words. The words make up the lyrics of a well-known song and user need to guess the song from the collected words.

item.title: OpenCV TicTacToe
item.description: The visual TicTacToe and Chinese ZhiQi game with OpenCV

item.title: Leo: Robot Assistant for the Elderly
item.description: An assistive gaming robot with Alexa Skills Kit for the elderly to maintain their cognitive fitness by interacting with preset games physically and verbally. Gaming modes include memory game, reflection game and verbal game with the advanced features like facial detection and voice command.

item.title: Unity B3 game
item.description: A 3D shooting game developed based on Unity 3D engine with totally original models, scripts, and background music. Most of those characters and scenes were built by voxel modeling, contributing to the unique game style, voxel style. This game style was widely spread with the population of sandbox games, like Minecraft.

item.title: System for Library Management
item.description: A desktop application based on Qt for library seats management with reservation and search features.

item.title: Android Memo Hana
item.description: A memorandum application on Android using the process of cultivating plants to symbolize userâ€™s schedule.

item.title: Personal Blog
item.description: This is my personal tech blog UnderFlow which is inspired by the Hugo template creative portfolio with following extra features: Tag filter for blog articles, New designs of sidebar and about pages with interactive effects, Contact pages using google maps and Multi-language support.
